title: Appomattox Court House National Historical Park: Learn About the Park
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park           Learn About the Park         The cast of the Fall Lantern Tour pose for a photo on the Clover Hill Tavern porch. NPS  News: Access press releases, updates, archived news, documents, plans, and projects.  Photos and Multi-Media: See the buildings and features of the park through time, past and present. History and Culture: Learn about the historical surrender event of the American Civil War and all that it entailed.  Nature: Discover just how rich Appomattox Court House National Historical Park is in natural resources, plant and animal life, and diverse environments.  Education: Find out about field trips and what the park has to offer you both as a visit and and as resource for classroom activities. Kids and Youth: Find out what the park has to offer children through its Junior Ranger Program, camps, and even trading cards. Management: Access staff and offices, as well as, laws and policies by selecting this category. Bookstore: Select this category for Information and the bookstore website.
